item.title: Publishing Hugo on Github Pages
item.description: Own scripts, Wordpress, Jekyll… Hugo! I had this idea of having my own blog for many years. I always wanted to write about programming - something I do everyday for many years now. My first attempt was to create a blog using PHP/HTML/CSS/JS from scratch. But I quickly realised this is a lot of work. I wanted my blog to be responsive and easy to maintain. My second attempt was installing Wordpress on some basic hosting platform with custom domain.
